show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content: My guest Stan White lost two sons to the war on terror, one from combat and the other from sudden death caused by… psychiatric drugs for the treatment of PTSD.  Stan and his wife Shirley have become advocates for better treatment of our military who suffer from the trauma of war.  This is a deeply moving, inspiring, and very informative hour.
